text: {| |} HMS Prince Regent was a 120-gun first rate three-decker ship of the line of the Royal Navy, launched on 12 April 1823 at Chatham. Served in the Baltic campaign in 1854 (1st campaign) but not in 1855 (2nd campaign). She was converted into a screw ship in 1861, and was broken up in 1873. ==Notes== ==References== *Lavery, Brian (2003) The Ship of the Line - Volume 1: The development of the battlefleet 1650-1850. Conway Maritime Press. . *Lyon, David and Winfield, Rif (2004) The Sail and Steam Navy List: All the Ships of the Royal Navy 1815-1889. Chatham Publishing, London. . Category:Ships of the line of the Royal Navy Category:Caledonia-class ships of the line Category:Ships built in Chatham Category:1823 ships
title: HMS Prince Regent (1823)
